subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: With the rampant use of steroids unveiled as one source of the game’s home run inflation, Hall voters have a chance to re-examine Jim Rice’s numbers in the context of his era and give him his best chance at induction.
snippet: With the rampant use of steroids unveiled as one source of the game’s home run inflation, Hall voters have a chance to re-examine Jim Rice’s numbers in the context of his era and give him his best chance at induction.
